Reviews.Title: Glad I got it
Reviews.Author: R.G. "prat72"
Reviews.Content: I hate buying a new camera.  But after the duct tape that held the battery door shut and the paperclip that holds the battery in finally game up on my old Olympus (8mp) it was time to get a new one. I researched and compared a variety of cameras before deciding on this one.  I use my phone a lot but sometimes just want to have a camera at the ready.  I used this on a field trip with my son to the zoo and the zoom made it like we could reach out and touch the animals.  This is a great inexspensive camera, glad I got it.

Reviews.Title: Small but powerful
Reviews.Author: deke62
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a Christmas gift for my wife. She and I are very happy with this camera. It is easy to use and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: GREAT camera
Reviews.Author: Erica J. Walton
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera on Cyber Monday and got a great deal on the price and package (it came with a free memory card and camera case) - because of this, I feel like we got an even better deal!  There are a lot of functions on this camera that we don't use because we mainly wanted a small (portable) point and shoot camera, but I will say that it takes amazing pictures and they are great quality too!

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Chase
Reviews.Content: Love this style camera. Very slim and compact - large display and handy features. Was happy to see that it worked OK. A bit skeptical about ordering a refurbished product, but saved quite a bit of $$ by doing so.
